content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 700 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I'd say I'm at a 7 on that scale.
name: Farhad Abbasi
